alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 6:09PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues in far southeast San Bernardino County. * WHERE...A portion of southern California, including the following county, San Bernardino. * WHEN...Until 815 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 606 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain continues to fall in far southeast San Bernardino County, around the Cooper Basin Reservoir. Elevated flows in normally dry washes i ongoing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Parker Dam, Earp, Big River and Black Meadow Landing Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
